name: DualWield
description:
This is a 2-player co-op top-down endless shooter where two of you control one player. One slinging a six-shooter, shooting and reloading, the other dodging the relentless swarm of enemies.  Try to reach a really high score.

Use the arrow keys to reload!

Enter the red smoke to progress to the next level.

If you press the "P" key in the Main Menu, you can set your Graphics Quality to Potato (or low). If you press the "H" key in the Main Menu, you set the quality to high.

Credits:
